name: Berserker
description: A path focused on unleashing primal fury in combat

skills.name: Rage
skills.description: You can use an action to become enraged for 1 minute. While you are enraged, you make attack rolls with 1 boon, and when you roll damage for a weapon attack, you roll an extra d6. Your rage ends early if you are incapacitated or if your turn ends and you didn't attack a hostile creature since your last turn. Once you use this talent, you cannot use it again until after you complete a rest.

skills.name: Thick Skin
skills.description: You treat all damage you take as if it were 1 less.

skills.name: Danger Sense
skills.description: You make Perception challenge rolls to notice hidden or invisible creatures or objects with 1 boon. In addition, when you make an Agility challenge roll or an attack roll to avoid or reduce damage from an effect you can see, such as a trap or a spell, you make the roll with 1 boon.

skills.name: Improved Rage
skills.description: When you use Rage, you can use it as a triggered action on your turn.

skills.name: Frightening
skills.description: When you use Rage, each creature of your choice that can see you within 5 yards must make a Will challenge roll. On a failure, the creature becomes frightened for 1 minute or until your rage ends. While frightened, the creature must attack you on its turn if it can; if it can't, it does nothing on its turn except move away from you.

skills.name: Unending Rage
skills.description: Your rage no longer ends if you don't attack a hostile creature since your last turn.
